body:
first of all; only dumb bitches think photos and beer empty cans mean someone drunk it. "Why are you taking photos like that to cohersion me to car about his life and actions?" What he does to his life, is his own consequences. Take it to the teachers. Mind you, I'll tell them you just tried to ask me for sex to blackmail him.    the more the 'person' using the evidence 'peer pressures' you tells you "THEY HAVE ANOTHER AGENDA" and when the proper authorities get the truth.  That the MC would of been seen innocent.  Thta fool, criminal charges kicked from school

Dating is allowed after school hours btw.  The school has no issues with your PERSONAL LIFE after "YOU LEAVE PROPERTY" its not their JOB TO BE YOUR PARENTS AND TEACH YOU SEX other then "ADULT EDUCATION COURSE" in health.

Now, part 2 is coming out soon, let me guess, goes on date with boyfriend then has sex, but guess what, shocking revelation he has a tiny dick and it doesn’t feel good, then goes back to this bull with one of the worst cuts I’ve ever seen. And boyfriend gets a video and gets hard, the end.
No I promise I’m not a time traveller

lol. Another rinse and repeat of blackmailing of a braindead girl trying to cover up her lover. Sure lover might be suspended or at worse be kicked out but it's his own fault and then they can still be together and be faithful but no, girl always pick to give their body to protect which is in fact worse as it's cheating and there's no guarantee that the scumbag blackmailer won't report it, it didn't even crossed their mind that it won't be a one time thing between them as if scumbag can blackmail their boyfriend so why can't they blackmail them directly instead. We need more Noise, Ichihaya and Malcorond doujins instead for better variations of story.
This is so funny man, all ntr stories are the same xD
Ntr artist are braindead, can't even write, i cant take this shit seriously with how bad written its
as much as i like ntr they should just not put a story at all  if it's gonna be so stupid lol should just put more fucking the art is good.

I think this is the most stupid of the reasons for a girl to give herself to someone ... Basically Kou, the protagonist, declares Manatsu, his sempai with whom he has been in love for 2 years, and although he agrees to become her lover, he is He asks to wait for the swimming tournament to finish before having a date ... Then Kou argues with another of his classmates who had taken pictures of Manatsu in a swimsuit and accidentally breaks his phone ... For this reason they both meet at Kou's house on the weekend and his classmate takes a picture of him asleep with a few beers to threaten the girl to make them "sexual friends" or publishes this photo ... I think on the phone he would have had " a little more sense "the abuse, but a photo only reveals how stupid Manantsu was to give up her virginity, since apparently she also fell easily into pleasure, although we will have to wait and see if there is a second chapter ... I can only say it's a waste of art in such a bad story
This kinda reminds me of studio pija..
